devdoc.author: Set Protocol Smart contract manager that contains permissions and admin functionality

params._data: Byte data of function to call in module

devdoc.title: ICManagerV2

addAdapter(address).notice: MUTUAL UPGRADE: Add a new adapter that the ICManagerV2 can call.

addModule(address).notice: OPERATOR ONLY: Add a new module to the SetToken.

interactModule(address,bytes).notice: ADAPTER ONLY: Interact with a module registered on the SetToken.

removeAdapter(address).notice: MUTUAL UPGRADE: Remove an existing adapter tracked by the ICManagerV2.

removeModule(address).notice: OPERATOR ONLY: Remove a new module from the SetToken.

setManager(address).notice: MUTUAL UPGRADE: Update the SetToken manager address. Operator and Methodologist must each call this function to execute the update.

setMethodologist(address).notice: METHODOLOGIST ONLY: Update the methodologist address

setOperator(address).notice: OPERATOR ONLY: Update the operator address
